summary: Survey360 Complete E2E Testing - All 9 features verified. Login with demo credentials works. Dashboard displays real API data (2 surveys, 2 responses, 2 active, 78% rate). Surveys page loads real surveys from API. Survey actions dropdown works (Edit, Publish/Unpublish, Duplicate, Delete, Copy Link, Open Public Form). Create new survey via New Survey button works. Survey builder accessible by clicking survey card. Public survey form at /s/{surveyId} loads and allows interaction. Responses page displays submitted responses. Export CSV button enabled when specific survey selected.
critical_code_review_comments: All Survey360 backend APIs working correctly - auth, surveys CRUD, responses, public endpoints
Frontend properly uses real API data - no mock data in production
Auth token persisted correctly via zustand store with localStorage
Public survey endpoint correctly restricts access to only published surveys
Export CSV builds proper CSV from survey questions and response answers
seed_data_creation: Demo user and organization created by backend on startup. 2 surveys exist with responses.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Survey360 is fully functional. All core flows tested: Login, Dashboard stats, Surveys CRUD, Survey Builder, Responses page, Export CSV, Public Survey Form. Backend uses MongoDB collections: survey360_users, survey360_orgs, survey360_surveys, survey360_responses. Test file created at /app/backend/tests/test_survey360_iter28.py with 18 comprehensive tests.

login_with_demo_credentials.details: Login with demo@survey360.io / Test123! works, redirects to dashboard

dashboard_statistics.details: Shows Total Surveys: 2, Total Responses: 2, Active Surveys: 2, Response Rate: 78%

surveys_page_real_api_data.details: Lists real surveys from API - 'Customer Feedback Survey' and 'E2E Test Survey - Customer Feedback'

survey_actions_dropdown.details: All options work: Edit Survey, Unpublish, Open Public Form, Copy Public Link, Duplicate, Delete

create_new_survey.details: New Survey button opens dialog, creates survey via API

navigate_to_survey_builder.details: Clicking survey card navigates to /surveys/{id}/edit with builder UI showing all 10 question types

public_survey_form.details: Public form at /s/{surveyId} loads with questions, progress bar, submit button

responses_page.details: Shows response table with respondent info, status, time, submitted date. View details dialog works.

export_csv.details: Export CSV button enabled when specific survey selected, disabled for 'All Surveys'
